titleStmt.title: A right use made by a stander by at the two disputations at Great All-hollowes; between Mr. Goodwin and Mr. Symson, the 14. of January and 11. of February 1649. Concerning the poynts of generall redemption, and inevitable damnation immediately from God alone.
titleStmt.author: Graunt, John, of Bucklersbury.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Simmons for John Hancock,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
